import React, { useState } from "react"; import {Form,Row,Col,Modal, Card, Button,Container, Navbar, Nav, } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; function UnidetailsComponent(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); var uniData={} function handleProceed(event){ uniData={ uniname:"", registration_date:"", expiration_data:"", img_url:"", no_of_students:"", email:"", web_url:"", contact_no:"" } } var formDisplay="true"; function LogoutClicked(){ localStorage.removeItem('uid'); } return(

Hello {localStorage.getItem('uid')}

University Name Registration Date Expiration Date Image Url Number of Students Email Web Url Contact Number
); } export default UnidetailsComponent;
